document.discussion_title: Three-year contract with London Business School
document.topic_text: Three-year contract with London Business School Published: April 25, 2016 by Neil Nixon Servest Group has won a contract with London Business School, the pre-eminent constituent college of the University of London. The contract will see 50 members of the Servest team provide cleaning, consumables, and waste services throughout the campus for the next three years. Servest secured the contract under a competitive tender process that included numerous site visits to showcase Servest's expertise at existing client sites, a formal submission, and a presentation. Rob Legge, Servest’s CEO UK and Europe, said: “This contract with London Business School - one of the best business schools in Europe - will give Servest an enhanced presence in the education sector. We are looking forward to raising the standards with this hugely prestigious organisation.” www.servest.com //www.servest.com Share this: Click to read the April 2016 issue now!
